top_comments.comment: You are spot on with a lot of these trends. Guys, he's talking about how to stay on trend. Chelsea boots and tight jeans were on trend but not anymore. They still look good though but aren't going to look as fashion conscious as that puffer and some relaxed denim with laced boots. I actually was thinking my bomber jacket from All Saints is not as wavy as it once was. I have been rocking my leather biker which one could argue peaked a year or two ago. But I'm also experimenting and just cooped my first pair of Rick Owens pants and shoes. Keep up the good content.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Oooh come on the bomber jacket ??
I came to give a thumbs down but you made some good points. A lot of these things have been getting run into the ground . I’ll consider some alternatives 🤔

Faux shearling jacket is also very much in trend which u didn't mention... it's not like u stop wearing those things or out of trend ..no doubt the items u suggested r grt alternatives.. please don't make so popular styles out of trend
